name: Warrior Beneath Heaven
description:
Warrior Beneath Heaven is a new action game brought to you by Keyue Studio that puts you at the heart of the ruthless inner war in the AD 730s China.
Many people come to China through the silk road.

TRAVEL TO ANCIENT CHINA
From lush vibrant forests to snow mountains.

SELECT YOUR FAVORITE WEAPONS
16 different weapons covers from the east to the west.
16 Different fight styles.

SELECT YOUR FIGHT
Choose a character to start duels or the multiplayer mode for two persons in one computer.
